Xu Pingqiu, who has rich anti-narcotics experience, took a fancy to Yu's top student scum group. Although they did not study well, they had polarized reviews. But each has its own strengths, knows how to advance and retreat, and has a bottom line. However, it is not easy to fight for Yu Zui and the scumbag who doesn't trust him and has no police dreams.
title: Bad Boy
